Your reservation at YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts is not valid until we have confirmed your reservation in writing, in the form of an email acknowledgement to you from YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts. Such email will summarize the bundled daily or multi-day packages reserved, the rates accepted by the guest, and your acknowledgement of the GTC, and contact information for YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts where the guest may submit a complaint. - Group Reservation. In the case of a group reservation, the guest must negotiate a YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts group contract, and the terms of such contract or of any YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts reservation contract will take precedence over the terms of the GTC, in the event of a conflict between the contract and the GTC. A group reservation is defined as reservation by 10 or more rooms under the same legal entity. - Deposit. One (1) night deposit for each room is due at time of booking to confirm your guaranteed reservation. For reservations confirmed from countries where local regulations prohibit guarantees to a credit card, payment by wire or check, for 100% of the total reservation, must be received by YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts. Your deposit may forfeit, and your reservation may cancel, if you arrive after Check-In Time without confirmation by YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts to cancel or modify your reservation. - Age Requirement. Guests must be 18 years or older with photo identification to reserve a room. - Minors. Minor children, age 16 and 17, may be included in your reservation, and are permitted to stay at YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts; note that such minors will require a parent or guardian to sign consent forms on their behalf, to participate in the therapy services at YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts. - Non-Transferable. Any reservation is personal and cannot be transferred to a third party under any circumstances, whether free of charge or in return for payment, except as authorized in writing by YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts. - Rates. Bundled daily or multi-day package (e.g., 3-day, 5-day, and 10-day) rates include room rental, scheduled therapy services and scheduled food and beverage services; but excludes Juice Bar service that is not part of your scheduled food and beverage services, and excludes services at the Tea Cafe. Rates are calculated, based upon check-in date, per day, and per multi-day package, and per day for add-on days to your selected multi-day package. All reservations, regardless of origin, are payable and confirmed in U.S. dollars, unless specifically indicated otherwise. - Taxes and Service Charges. Applicable taxes and service charges, if applicable, will be added to your YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts bill, and refer to those taxes and service charges currently in effect. Taxes and service charges are subject to change without notice, according to local law. - Administrative Charges.An administrative fee of 18% will be added to the invoice of A-La-Carte Wellness Services. Please note that this administrative charge is for administration and overhead costs, is not a gratuity or purported to be a gratuity and is not distributed as gratuities to any employee. If you wish to leave a gratuity, you may do so at your discretion. - Administrative Charges for dining.A 10% administrative fee is charged by the dining room towards retail lunch/dinners. - Incidentals Policy.
